title: NII Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Senior Project Associate Posts
description: The National Institute of Immunology (NII) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Senior Project Associate Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Post-graduation, Ph.D., and M.Sc. can apply for the NII Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection...
